title: Why did Hitler kill people? If so, how many? - Quora

response.answer_text: In short, he was an evil bastard and the peop;e he killed were in his way so he had them killed. The Jews were blammed for all of Germanys problems, you didnt have food to eat or a good job because of the money grubbing Jews, Germany lost WW! because of the Jews, and watch out for the communists. His total body count was probably approaching 60 million.
Addi Hitler killed people because he was a Zombie and needed to eat human brains to survive. He killed about 42 people.
